chunks.cleaned_english_translation: Notice regarding the two following sermons. These two sermons, previously unpublished, were transcribed from a Vatican manuscript by the distinguished Luca Holstenius in the past and sent here by the eminent Cardinal Barberini. Since it was not possible to publish them in sequence with the other sermons of Saint Fulgentius, it seemed fitting to include them here at the end of his works. We have little doubt that the first sermon truly belongs to Fulgentius; however, we believe the second should be attributed to another author, who is indeed respected, although possibly later than Fulgentius. We have not yet discovered who that author is.
chunks.original_latin:
ADMONITIO
IN SERMONES DUOS QUI SEQUUNTUR. 664 Sermones hosce duos hactenus ineditos, e Vaticano
codice a viro clarissimo Luca Holstenio olim descriptos,
et ab eminentissimo cardinale Barberino huc missos,
quia cum caeteris sancti Fulgentii sermonibus suo
ordine in lucem edere non licuit, visum est hic ad calcem
 operum ejus apponere. Horum autem priorem vera
Fulgentii esse vix dubitamus; posteriori vero auctorem
alium, et hunc quidem probatum, licet forte Fulgentio
posteriorem vindicandum arbitramur. Quis vero
sit ille hactenus non comperimus.
